alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Prairie; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:16AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Roosevelt, south central Sheridan, southeastern McCone, northern Prairie, northern Dawson and Richland Counties through 115 AM MDT... At 1215 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Lambert, or 29 miles west of Sidney, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Culbertson, Fairview, Brockton, Bainville, Froid, Richey, Bloomfield, Fort Union Trading Post, Lambert, Lindsay, East Fairview, Snowden, Fort Kipp, Homestead, Enid, Nohly, Fort Union and Mccabe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM MDT for northeastern Montana.
